main_dish.title: Chicken & Asparagus Toss
instructions: Prepare rice per package directions.
Set aside.
Meanwhile, in a small bowl, whisk together the lemon zest, lemon juice, oil & salt.
In large skillet, bring 1/2 cup water to boil over high heat.
Add asparagus and return to boil.
Reduce heat and simmer, covered, for 2 mins, or until the asparagus is just crisp-tender.
Drain & set aside.
Lightly spray same skillet with cooking spray and turn heat to med/high.
Add chicken and dill to skillet and cook for 5 mins per side or until chicken is no longer pink in center (internal temp of 165) stirring frequently.
Stir asparagus and garlic into chicken mixture.
Cook for 30 seconds, stirring constantly.
Remove from heat.
Add lemon mixture to chicken, stirring gently to coat.
Serve chicken over rice.

main_dish.title: Salmon with Mango Strawberry Salsa
instructions: Preheat grill to med heat or oven to 375.
If using oven: spray baking dish with cooking spray and place fish in dish skin side down.
If grilling, lightly oil grill grates.
Drizzle fish with half of lime juice and season with salt and pepper.
Cook fish for 15 to 20 mins to desired level of doneness.
Total time will depend on the thickness of fish.
While fish is cooking, in small bowl mix mango, strawberries, remaining lime juice, ginger, salt, and cilantro (if using).
Serve fish topped with salsa or serve alongside.

side_dishes.title: Tomatoes & Cukes
instructions: Mix tomatoes and cucumbers in bowl with oil & vinegar, salt & pepper.
Simple!

side_dishes.title: Smashed Red Potatoes
instructions: Boil quartered potatoes in salted water until fork tender, about 15 mins, depending on the size of potatoes.
Drain water and mash in pot with potato masher or fork, leaving skins on.
Add butter and salt & pepper to taste.
For extra flavor add sour cream, cream cheese, grated cheese or garlic powder.

notes: Could make turkey mixture in advance, stuff when ready

main_dish.title: Roasted Pepper Gobblers
ingredients: 3 red/orange/yellow bell peppers, cut in half, seeds removed
instructions: Preheat oven to 400.
Put peppers on baking sheet lined with foil for easy cleanup.
Brush with oil on all sides & lightly sprinkle salt on cut side.
Roast, cut side up for 10 mins.
While peppers cook, heat a skillet on med.
Add oil, then the rest of ingredients (except yogurt) and brown, stirring until turkey is cooked through.
Salt to taste.
Remove peppers from oven and fill with turkey mixture.
Bake for another 10 mins.
Serve topped with a dollop of yogurt.

side_dishes.title: Mixed Greens
instructions: Toss greens with salad dressing of choice.

main_dish.title: Mexican Shrimp & Avocado Salad
ingredients: 8 oz black beans, low sodium, drained & rinsed
instructions: In med bowl, mix shrimp with 1 tbs lime juice and half the cumin.
Season with salt & pepper.
Set aside.
In large serving bowl, mix tomatoes, onion, cilantro, 1 tbs oil, and remaining lime juice & cumin.
Season with salt and pepper.
Let sit for 10 mins, then add avocado and beans.
Heat remaining oil in med skillet on med/high.
Add shrimp and cook until pink, about 4 mins.
Add salad greens and shrimp to tomato/avocado/bean mixture and toss to combine.
Top with sour cream and/or cheese, if using.

side_dishes.title: Fresh Watermelon
instructions: Slice or cut into chunks and serve.

notes: Can Make Ahead and Then Reheat

main_dish.title: Baked Veggie Ziti
ingredients: 8 oz diced tomatoes with basil, garlic & oregano
1/2 cup shredded cheddar cheese, low fat
5 oz frozen spinach, thawed & drained of excess water
instructions: Preheat oven to 350.
Cook pasta according to package.
Drain & return to pan.
Stir in pasta sauce, tomatoes, and cheeses.
Set aside.
In skillet, heat oil on med & add shallots.
Cook for 5 minutes until soft.
Add squash & cook for about 5 minutes more until just tender.
Stir in spinach & add veggies to pasta.
Spray 8 x 8 casserole dish with cooking spray and spoon mixture into dish, cover with foil.
Bake for 15 to 20 minutes until hot and bubbly.
Sprinkle with some additional cheese before serving, if desired.

side_dishes.title: Green Beans
instructions: Cook green beans over simmering water until just bright green.
